comment: "Sierra recently cut its freelance rates but their contracts demand all the same rights as before, including rights for pieces to be licensed, reprinted, revised, and repackaged by Sierra for other purposes, potentially even commercial purposes, in "all forms in all media (and by or through all technologies) whether now known or hereafter developed." In I'd be extremely wary of their contracts; don't let them take rights they are no longer paying for."
